Name: Drova - Teaser
About the game: JOIN OUR DISCORD & OUR NEWSLETTER We created this Teaser to show you the vision of our game and to give you a first impression of the feeling we want to create with Drova. After the Order has accepted you as a novice, you are sent to the unknown land called Draheim. There the conflict between the Order and a local faction is about to escalate. Alban, high-ranking scout of the Order, awaits you in the tavern “To the Headless Ripper” with an important report of the area. Get the report and get out. Sounds easy, doesn't it? DISCOVER A HANDCRAFTED WORLD Explore the beautiful and mysterious area of Draheim and learn more about the inhabitants and secrets related to your mission. USE THE MULTIFACETED COMBAT SYSTEM Use different weapons and a variety of abilities to develop your own combat strategy. Always keep an eye on your Flow resource as it allows you to unleash these powerful abilities. To succeed in this harsh environment, you have to level your character and find new items, as skill alone won’t be enough to prevail.
